author: Huileng Tan
title: China pursues global leadership ambitions as it offers aid during the coronavirus crisis
description: On social and state media, China continues to promote its shipments of medical supplies to hard hit countries in Europe and Africa.
content:
Beijing is bolstering its soft power and taking the lead in a global response to the coronavirus public health crisis. The moves come as China's daily number of new infections decline while those in the U.S. rise.
In the last few weeks, Chinese President Xi … [+4916 chars]
